name: Glass Breaker
description:
Glass breaker is a game to remove two or more blocks of the same shape.

However, you can get as many points by detonating many blocks at once.

Action mode opens up a lot of block games in less than a minute.

In the original mode, you need to achieve the target scores to clear the stage before you can proceed to the next level.

You're going to blow and break a cool glass blocks stress.

Features
- Various Game Mode(Original, Action, Shift)
- Auto Save

Enjoy!
